fields.name: awarenessOfPlaceholderText
fields.label: Are you familiar with the use of placeholder text (e.g., Lorem Ipsum)?

fields.name: usefulnessOfPlaceholderText
fields.label: How useful do you find placeholder text in design and layout work?

fields.name: frequencyOfUse
fields.label: How often do you use placeholder text in your projects?

fields.name: preferredTypeOfPlaceholder
fields.label: What type of placeholder text do you prefer to use?

fields.name: impactOnDesignProcess
fields.label: How does placeholder text impact your design process?

fields.name: challengesWithPlaceholderText
fields.label: What challenges do you face when using placeholder text?

fields.name: clientFeedback
fields.label: Have you received any feedback from clients regarding the use of placeholder text?

fields.name: improvementsForPlaceholderText
fields.label: What improvements would you suggest for the use of placeholder text?

fields.name: alternativeMethods
fields.label: Do you use any alternative methods to placeholder text for layout purposes?

fields.name: importanceInPrototyping
fields.label: How important is placeholder text in the prototyping phase?

fields.name: examplesOfUse
fields.label: Can you provide examples of when placeholder text was particularly useful?

fields.name: futureUse
fields.label: Do you plan to continue using placeholder text in future projects?

fields.name: additionalComments
fields.label: Any additional comments or feedback on placeholder text?
